text: Defiance is a 1980 action crime drama movie directed by John Flynn and stars Jan-Michael Vincent, Theresa Saldana, Art Carney, and Danny Aiello. The movie was unsuccessful upon release. It was produced by Jerry Bruckheimer. == Other websites == * Category:1980 action movies Category:1980 crime drama movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by John Flynn
title: Defiance (1980 movie)
